title: LoL PBE (Active Players)

replies.body: Generally? Not really.  It's pretty much just activating accounts when additional testers are needed.  As far as I'm aware, it's pretty random.  We may sometimes reach out to individuals for specific circumstances, but those are on a case-by-case basis.

I dont think that pbe must be random...i mean you must give this option to Players who they have good behavior and they are active to community...
(This is my Option).

i wouldn't hold your breath over pbe. i've been signed up for years and i haven't heard a word.

¯\_(ツ)_/¯
I signed up for PBE in early 2014 and got nothing so far so i guess its RNG.
